      • provideInstance

        public <T> void provideInstance(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                T instance)
        Description copied from interface: ServerCoreComponents
        The ServerCoreComponents can hold implementations for a given service and share this between several modules (see ServerModule). This method must be used to add such an instance of a service to the core components.
        Specified by:
        provideInstance in interface ServerCoreComponents
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the service
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of the service
        instance - the instance of the service
        See Also:
        ServerModule, ServerCoreComponents.getInstance(Class)

      • getInstance

        public <T> T getInstance(java.lang.Class<T> cls)
        Description copied from interface: ServerCoreComponents
        The ServerCoreComponents can hold implementations for a given service and share this between several modules (see ServerModule). This method must be used to access such an instance of a service.
        Specified by:
        getInstance in interface ServerCoreComponents
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the service
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of the service
        Returns:
        the instance of the service
        See Also:
